resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81185</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81185</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4706</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Introduction to Confirmation Mass</string>
            <string language="es">Introducción a la misa de confirmación</string>
            <string language="ga">Réamhrá ar Aifreann an Chóineartaithe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung in eine Bestätigung Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction à la masse de confirmation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução à massa da confirmação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione alla massa di conferma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στη μάζα επιβεβαίωσης</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Resource outlining a sample layout for the Confirmation Mass including readings, prayers and songs which may be used in order to help students prepare.</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso que muestra una composición de muestra para la misa de Confirmación, se incluyen lecturas, oraciones y canciones que se pueden usar para ayudar a los estudiantes a prepararse.</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn a imlíníonn leagan amach samplach d’Aifreann an Chóineartaithe lena n’áirítear léamha, páidreacha agus amhráin ar féidir a úsáid chun cabhrú le daltaí réiteach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religion</string>
            <string language="es">Religión</string>
            <string language="ga">Reiligiún</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfsmittel, das einen Beispielplan für die 
Bestätigung Masse einschließlich Messwerte, Gebete und Liede, die, 
umreißt verwendet werden können, um Kursteilnehmern zu helfen sich 
vorzubereiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource traçant les grandes lignes d'une 
disposition témoin pour la masse de confirmation comprenant les 
lectures, les prières et les chansons qui peuvent être employées 
afin d'aider des étudiants à préparer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso que esboça uma disposição da amostra 
para a massa da confirmação including as leituras, os prayers e as 
canções que podem ser usados a fim ajudar a estudantes se preparar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa che descrive una disposizione del 
campione per la massa di conferma compreso le letture, le preghiere e 
le canzoni che possono essere usate per aiutare gli allievi a 
prepararsi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς που περιγράφει ένα σχεδιάγραμμα
δειγμάτων για τη μάζα επιβεβαίωσης συμπεριλαμβανομένων των 
αναγνώσεων, των προσευχών και των τραγουδιών που μπορούν να 
χρησιμοποιηθούν προκειμένου να ενισχυθούν οι σπουδαστές να 
προετοιμαστούν.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Religião</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Religione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
